elements.title: Blinking Sam (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Samuel Johnson did not want to be depicted as "Blinking Sam" (pictured)?

elements.title: Sun Chen (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Olympic breakdancer Sun Chen is nicknamed "Quake" as he was born on the day of a deadly earthquake?

elements.title: The Eternaut 1969 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that The Eternaut 1969 is a reboot of the original comic, with an anti-imperialist tone?

elements.title: Reed Timmer (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that storm chaser Reed Timmer feared thunder and lightning at a young age?

elements.title: Durrës Expedition (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Durrës Expedition in 1376 saw Louis of Évreux successfully recapture Durrës from Karl Thopia, only for Thopia to reclaim the city in 1383?

elements.title: Robert Turner (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Robert Turner remained in post for around 30 years after being described as "the oldest soldier in the Royal Artillery"?

elements.title: by substructure (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that you can search Wikipedia or a database of more than 37 billion compounds by substructure?

elements.title: Robert Stumper (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Luxembourgian myrmecologist Robert Stumper also played as a goalkeeper for his nation's football team?

elements.title: Mama (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that mamas sang on "Mama"?
